name: UpdateOrganizationRole
description:
Update an organization's role details.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific role within an organization, such as permissions and role information.

parameters.name: role_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the role to be updated in the organization.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this role.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the organization where the role will be updated. This is a required parameter.

parameters.name: role_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the role's updated attributes, including id, name, creation details, members, and default status.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this role.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this role.
